An error occurred while sending data to OpenDB.
An error occurred while processing battle data.
An error occurred while processing data. \nIt is recommended that you restart kcanotify.
Kancolle For Android is not installed.
Screen Overlay Permission is required for BattleView. Enable Screen Overlay at Settings > Screen Overlay Settings.
An update is available. (%s)\nDo you wish to download it?
This setting is not required for Android versions below 6.0.
In application manager, activate [Kcanotify] in "Draw over other apps"(Apps that can appear on top).
Allow Screen Overlay: Off (BattleView will be disabled)
In Android 5.0+, you should set this permission to use this feature. This permission is required for checking kancolle is on the screen.
Please restart kcanotify to apply new language setting.
By using %s, you agree to the GNU General Public License 3.0. The whole source code is available on github repository.
Please open the game from within kcanotify.
Everyone in <%s> has recovered their morale.
The fleet is currently under repair.
Please restart the game using kcanotify.
Game data is not loaded completely.\\nIf the data is not loaded for long time, download game data using kcanotify Settings manually.
A problem in game data was detected.\\\\nPlease download game data using kcanotify Settings manually.
There is no data for current api version in kcanotify server.\nPlease restart the kcanotify later(about 10~20 min).
Select server you want to play. (Hint: the higher the left, the better. recommend to avoid two bottom servers if available.)
Display remaining/left time for Expeditions on the navbar
When checked, the navbar will always be the top of notifications
Use if game data was not loaded automatically.
Show Fairy only in Kancolle Screen
There is a delay in showing/hiding fairy.
※ Fairy will be changed after current BattleView/QuestView ends.
Set button order in the right side
Restart service to apply the change.
Takes up some of device\'s storage space.
Set Screen Overlay Permission (required for BattleView).

Set 0 for all ships regardless of the level
Show Name of Ship in Construction
Display the name of the ship in construction by FleetView.
Fix the vertical position of view to current position
Screen notification when a fleet recovers the morale minimum.
Screen notification when anchorage repair begins.
Sound/Vibrate when a ship is heavily damaged (Toast will always appear).
Sound/Vibrate when incompletely supplied fleet exist (Toast will always appear).
Vibrate when hide the fairy by long-touch.
Fairy will shine brightly when tracked quest is completed
Try to enable this when node prediction/heavy damage alert does not appear.
Will be activated after setting the password.
WARNING: Never enter your real password used in DMM!
An error occurred while processing battle data.
